name: paste-to-markdown
title: Paste to Markdown
description: Paste to Markdown is a utility extension for Raycast that instantly converts rich text or HTML content from the user's clipboard into clean, well-formatted Markdown.
author: weicodes

commands.name: paste-to-markdown
commands.title: Paste to Markdown
commands.description: Instantly converts rich text or HTML content from the user's clipboard into clean, well-formatted Markdown.

preferences.name: headingStyle
preferences.title: Heading Style
preferences.description: Choose the style for headings in the converted Markdown

preferences.name: bulletListMarker
preferences.title: Bullet List Marker
preferences.description: Choose the marker for bullet lists

preferences.name: codeBlockStyle
preferences.title: Code Block Style
preferences.description: Choose the style for code blocks

preferences.name: enableGfm
preferences.label: Enable GitHub Flavored Markdown
preferences.description: Enable support for tables, strikethrough, and task lists

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
